item.title: 纳米比亚连续第三次将关键利率降至 7
item.description: 随着通胀率降至三年多来的最低点，纳米比亚中央银行连续第三次下调了关键利率。【原文：Namibia’s central bank lowered its key interest rate for a third time in a row as inflation eased to a more than three-year low.】

item.title: 贸易战风险加剧，沙特股市有望反弹
item.description: 沙特股市自 2020 年以来首次落后于新兴市场基准，但一些投资者认为有几个原因可以解释为什么明年的情况会更好。【原文：Saudi stocks are trailing emerging-market benchmarks for the first time since 2020, but some investors see several reasons why next year could turn out better.】

item.title: 经济合作与发展组织（OECD）称，如果不增加税收，英国的财政状况将难以为继
item.description: 经合组织（OECD）在上调英国经济增长预测时表示，英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）需要进一步提高税收，以确保公共财政的可持续发展。【原文：British Chancellor Rachel Reeves will need to raise taxes further to get the public finances on a sustainable footing, the OECD said as it upgraded its growth forecasts for the UK.】

item.title: 经合组织警告：世界正面临从贸易紧张到债务的危险
item.description: 经合组织（OECD）表示，全球经济面临着从贸易紧张局势到战争和债务问题等层出不穷的风险，这些风险可能会威胁到其过去几年 "非凡的恢复力"。【原文：The global economy faces proliferating risks ranging from trade tensions to wars and debt troubles that could threaten its “remarkable resilience” of past years, the OECD said.】

item.title: 埃及结束联合银行发行，资产出售计划取得进展
item.description: 埃及完成了首次公开发行联合银行 30% 股份的工作，这是在国际货币基金组织支持下出售国有资产、促进经济发展的努力中迈出的一步。【原文：Egypt concluded its initial public offering of 30% of United Bank, a step forward in an International Monetary Fund-backed drive to sell off state assets and boost the economy.】

item.title: 韩国央行行长李明博称不太可能因政治动荡而降息
item.description: 韩国央行行长李昌镛（Rhee Chang-yong）表示，央行不太可能因短暂的政治事件而降息。【原文：Bank of Korea Governor Rhee Chang-yong said it is unlikely the central bank will cut interest rates in response to a short-lived political event.】

item.title: 囤积咖啡和暴雨导致越南咖啡豆供应紧张
item.description: 越南的咖啡供应因种植者囤积咖啡豆和暴雨导致收获延迟而受到挤压，但这个世界上最大的罗布斯塔咖啡生产国受到的干扰预计将是短暂的。【原文：Vietnam’s coffee supply has been squeezed by growers hoarding their beans and a delay to harvesting caused by heavy rain, but the disruption in the world’s top producer of robusta is expected to be short-lived.】

item.title: 捷克央行行长称降息可能很快停止
item.description: 捷克央行行长 Ales Michl 表示，捷克央行可能将在近期停止宽松货币政策，并在一段时间内保持利率稳定，以使通胀率回到目标水平。【原文：The Czech central bank will probably halt its monetary easing in the near future and hold rates stable for some time to bring inflation back to the target, Governor Ales Michl said.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长雷恩认为 12 月降息理由更充分
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员奥利-雷恩（Olli Rehn）告诉芬兰报纸《赫尔辛基新闻报》，欧洲中央银行将在未来几个月继续放宽政策。【原文：The European Central Bank will continue to ease policy in the coming months, Governing Council member Olli Rehn told Finnish newspaper Helsingin Sanomat.】

item.title: 韩国前贸易部长称尹炳世犯了严重错误
item.description: 韩国前贸易部长批评总统尹锡烈颁布戒严令的错误决定，这一决定引发了公众的强烈不满，并震撼了全球金融市场。【原文：A former South Korean Trade Minister criticized President Yoon Suk Yeol for his ill-fated decision to decree martial law that sparked a public outcry and jolted financial markets around the world.】

item.title: 阿曼 OQ 公司甲醇部门首次公开募股融资 4.89 亿美元
item.description: 阿曼国有能源公司甲醇和液化石油气部门首次公开发行股票，募集资金 4.89 亿美元，中东上市需求持续升温。【原文：Oman’s state energy company raised $489 million with the initial public offering of its methanol and liquefied petroleum gas unit, amid continued demand for Middle East listings.】

item.title: 一场错误的赌博颠覆了交易商对韩国及其他地区的看法
item.description: 韩国的戒严令是短暂的，但对该地区全球投资者的影响可能会持续一段时间。【原文：South Korea’s martial law decree was short-lived but the implications for global investors in the region may roll on for some time.】

item.title: 韩国危机只是全局的一小部分
item.description:
战后经济秩序的受益者在越来越大的压力下四分五裂。【原文：

The beneficiaries of the postwar economic order are fragmenting under increasing pressure.

】

item.title: 据说 ESR 收购集团接近提出 70 亿美元的约束性收购要约
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，一个寻求收购香港上市公司 ESR 集团有限公司的财团正接近以每股 13 港元的约束性报价收购这家物流地产公司，此举将使长达数月的收购行动更接近尾声。【原文：A consortium seeking to buy out Hong Kong-listed ESR Group Ltd. is nearing a HK$13-a-share binding offer for the logistics real estate firm, people familiar with the matter said, a move that would bring the months-long takeover pursuit one step closer to an end.】

item.title: 调查显示瑞典短期通胀预期保持稳定
item.description: 在瑞典中央银行提出本月晚些时候降息并在明年上半年再次降息的路径后，瑞典的短期通胀率预期保持稳定。【原文：Expectations for short-term inflation rates in Sweden held steady after the central bank laid out a path of a cut in interest rates later this month and again during the first half of next year.】

item.title: 挪威削减房屋净值贷款需求以帮助首次购房者
item.description: 挪威财政部正在降低购买住房前所需的储蓄额，以方便首次购房者进入市场。【原文：Norway’s finance ministry is lowering the amount of savings needed before buying a dwelling to make it easier for first-time home buyers to enter the market.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市连涨五天后可能下滑
迪拜亿万富翁计划在亚洲各地建设数据中心
item.description: 随着东南亚成为人工智能和云服务的中心，由亿万富翁开发商侯赛因-萨贾瓦尼（Hussain Sajwani）支持的达马克集团（Damac Group）计划投资约 30 亿美元，在东南亚各地建设数据中心。【原文：Damac Group, backed by billionaire developer Hussain Sajwani, plans to invest about $3 billion to build data centers across Southeast Asia as the region becomes a hub for AI and cloud services.】

item.title: 胡塞武装袭击后油轮着火的船长感受
item.description: 阿夫希拉什-拉瓦特（Avhilash Rawat）船长刚吃完晚饭，一枚反舰弹道导弹就击中了他的油轮。【原文：Captain Avhilash Rawat had just finished dinner when an anti-ship ballistic missile smashed into his oil tanker.】

item.title: 津巴布韦中央银行将非洲最高利率维持在 35
item.description: 津巴布韦中央银行保留了非洲最高利率，并确认其紧缩货币政策立场将持续到 2025 年。【原文：Zimbabwe’s central bank retained Africa’s highest interest rate and affirmed its tight monetary policy stance will continue into 2025.】

item.title: 恩智浦与台积电联营公司计划扩建价值 78 亿美元的新加坡工厂
item.description: 恩智浦半导体公司（NXP Semiconductors NV）和台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：NXP Semiconductors NV and a Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. affiliate are discussing an expansion of their $7.8 billion Singapore venture, recognizing a need to diversify chip production in anticipation of growing US-Chinese tensions over technology.】

item.title: 花旗集团在澳大利亚大宗交易中面临 2,600 万美元的损失
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，花旗集团无法完全出售其为中国主权财富基金承销的澳大利亚嘉民集团（Goodman Group）的一批股票，因此可能面临高达 4100 万澳元（2600 万美元）的损失。【原文：Citigroup Inc. is facing potential losses of as much as A$41 million ($26 million) after it was unable to fully sell a block of shares in Australia’s Goodman Group it had underwritten for China’s sovereign wealth fund, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 伦敦股市以十多年来最快速度萎缩
item.description: 对在伦敦上市的公司的收购正在使英国股市以十多年来最快的速度萎缩。【原文：Takeovers of London-listed companies are shrinking the UK stock market at the fastest pace in more than a decade.】

item.title: 卡塔尔将与英国共同投资 10 亿英镑发展绿色科技，推动城市关系发展
item.description: 在英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）继续推动经济增长之际，卡塔尔和英国宣布建立新的合作伙伴关系，投资气候技术，并计划深化金融服务领域的合作。【原文：Qatar and the UK announced a new partnership to invest in climate technologies plus a plan to deepen cooperation in financial services, as British Prime Minister Keir Starmer continues a push to spur economic growth.】

item.title: 日本央行出售 10 年期现金债券以缓解与期货挂钩的资金短缺问题
item.description: 日本央行出售了其持有的部分与期货挂钩的 10 年期政府债券，以改善这些证券的交易流动性，这些证券通常被用作对冲市场波动的工具。【原文：The Bank of Japan has sold some of its holdings of futures-linked 10-year government bonds to improve the trading liquidity of these securities, which are often used as hedging tools against market volatility.】

item.title: 中国债券反弹助推关键会议前的杠杆押注
item.description: 中国债券的历史性反弹很可能会促使交易员进行更多的杠杆押注，因为他们担心美国可能征收关税所带来的影响，并预期会有进一步的政策放松。【原文：China’s historic bond rally is likely prompting traders to take on more leveraged bets, driven by expectations of further policy easing amid concerns over the impact from the potential US tariffs.】

item.title: 谁来收拾壳牌在尼日利亚的烂摊子？
item.description:
这家能源巨头表示，它将对漏油事故进行补救。批评人士称，出售一家子公司的提议可以帮助该公司避免为无数次泄漏事件买单。【原文：

The energy giant says it remedies spills it’s responsible for. Critics say a proposed sale of a subsidiary could help it avoid paying for countless leaks.

】

item.title: 丹斯克称通胀风险降低为挪威降息敞开大门
item.description: 丹斯克银行（Danske Bank A/S）的经济学家在一份新的预测报告中说，通胀风险的缓解意味着挪威在3月份之前开始降低借贷成本的 "大门已经敞开"。【原文：Easing inflation risks mean the “door is open” for Norway to start lowering borrowing costs earlier than March, economists at Danske Bank A/S said in a new forecast.】

item.title: 波兰将维持利率不变，通胀下滑被视为暂时现象
item.description: 波兰将把暂停加息的时间延长至一年多，因为决策者们希望摆脱近期通胀率下降和经济增长疲软的局面，以看到一个清晰的前景。【原文：Poland is set to extend its pause on interest rates to more than a year as policymakers look past a recent decline in inflation and weakening economic growth for a clear outlook to emerge.】

item.title: 游说团体称，肯尼亚企业在政策和税收转移下步履维艰
item.description: 由于税收和政府政策削弱了竞争力和购买力，大多数肯尼亚制造商的生产能力不足一半。【原文：Most Kenyan manufacturers are operating at less than half of their capacity, weighed down by taxes and government policies that have reduced competitiveness and purchasing power.】
